    About the Author

    Semmy Purewal, Senior Software Engineer at Netflix, spent nearly a decade teaching computer science and working as a freelance JavaScript consultant. During that time, he worked with a diverse group of clients that included start-ups, nonprofit organizations, and research labs.

    Visit Semmy's Homepage
